Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers

Class ClusterConfig

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers.ClusterConfig
public class ClusterConfig
extends java.lang.Object
ClusterConfig describes the desired state of a cluster.

    • getMinReplicas

      public int getMinReplicas()
      Gets the desired minimum number of managed servers running in this cluster. This is only used when the operator does a rolling restart of the cluster.
      Returns:
      min replicas
